Ram skull helm
Released10 April 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemRag and Bone Man II
Properties
TradeableNo
EquipableYes

OptionsWear
DestroyThe ram skull helm looks like it will fall apart if you drop it. You would have to go to the Odd Old Man for a replacement.
ExamineMakes me feel baaad to the bone.
Values
Value1 coin
High alch0 coins
Low alch0 coins
Weight3.175 kg
Advanced data
Item ID7917

The ram skull helm is a helmet given as a reward, alongside the bonesack, for completing Rag and Bone Man II. If lost, the Odd Old Man will offer a replacement for free.

It requires 30 Defence to wear. The helmet's stats are identical to an adamant full helmet, except without the negative Magic attack bonus or Magic defence bonus.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+0-2
 Defence bonuses
+19+21+16+0+19
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
18 June 2020
(update | poll)

Players can now simultaneously own the ram skull helm and bonesack.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Ram skull helm's examine text is a reference to the song "Bad to the Bone" by George Thorogood and the Destroyers.

The '''ram skull helm''' is a helmet given as a reward, alongside the [[bonesack]], for completing [[Rag and Bone Man II]]. If lost, the [[Odd Old Man]] will offer a replacement for free.

It requires 30 [[Defence]] to wear. The helmet's stats are identical to an [[adamant full helmet]], except without the negative [[Magic]] [[attack bonus]] or Magic [[defence bonus]].
